item.title: 0101.Symmetric Tree
item.description: 101. Symmetric Tree # 题目 # Given a binary tree, check whether it is a mirror of itself (ie, symmetric around its center). For example, this binary tree [1,2,2,3,4,4,3] is symmetric: 1 / \ 2 2 / \ / \ 3 4 4 3 But the following [1,2,2,null,3,null,3] is not: 1 / \ 2 2 \ \ 3 3 代码 # use std::rc::Rc; use std::cell::RefCell; impl Solution { pub fn is_symmetric(root: Option<Rc<RefCell<TreeNode>>>) -> bool { let root = root.
